sentences.english: He raised those goats from new-born kids.
sentences.chinese: 那些羊從小羊羔時就是他餵養的。

sentences.english: They are to eat the lamb, together with unleavened bread and bitter herbs.
sentences.chinese: 他們也要用無酵餅和苦菜與逾越節的羊羔同吃。

sentences.english: Abraham set apart seven ewe lambs from the flock.
sentences.chinese: 亞伯拉罕把七支母羊羔另放在一處。

sentences.english: Mary had a little lamb, its fleece was white as snow.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗有隻小羊羔，啊縝雪白小羊羔。

sentences.english: Mary had a little lamb, its fleece was white as snow.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗有隻小羊羔，啊縝雪白小羊羔。

sentences.english: Lamb and mutton are popular meats in many regions of the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 中東許多地區的人們都愛喫羊羔肉和羊肉。

sentences.english: Next year this sheep will give birth to a lamb.
sentences.chinese: 明年這隻羊要生一隻羊羔。

sentences.english: Mengke's second elder sister has found the lost lamb in the bush.
sentences.chinese: 二姐在灌木裏發現了走失的羊羔。

sentences.english: Dimitri found out that his neighbour, Aleko, had suddenly accquired a new lamb.
sentences.chinese: 迪米特里發現他的鄰居阿列科家多了一隻小羊羔。

sentences.english: The lambs were kept in the stockade.
sentences.chinese: 小羊羔被放在圍欄裏養着。

sentences.english: He is to slaughter the lamb in the holy place where the sin offering and the burnt offering are slaughtered.
sentences.chinese: 把公羊羔宰於聖地，就是宰贖罪祭牲和燔祭牲之地。

sentences.english: The lambs must be made off fat early in summer.
sentences.chinese: 初夏時必須把羊羔喂肥以便出售。

sentences.english: This great Shiraz is a ideal complement for dishes like roast venison with cranberries or lamb with mint sauce.
sentences.chinese: 搭配酸莓鹿肉或薄荷醬羊羔肉都很理想。

sentences.english: Lambs frisk and play, the shepherds pipe all day.
sentences.chinese: 羊羔歡躍喜洋洋，牧童整天笛聲揚。

sentences.english: I went after it, struck it and rescued the sheep from its mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我就追趕它，擊打它，將羊羔從它口中救出來。

sentences.english: South Suffolk rams may be used on any breed of ewe and will even produce prime lambs from Merino ewes.
sentences.chinese: 南薩福克公羊也許能與任一種母羊生產出頭等羊羔。

definition: (fig.) attractive and easy mark/source of steady profit/moneymaker/cash cow
